title: Cornerstone Home Lending Supports Families In Need With $25,000 In Housing Assistance
text:
Cornerstone Home Lending, Inc.
HOUSTON , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Cornerstone Home Lending, Inc. is dedicated to the company's founding mission: To make a positive difference in the lives of others. This year, Cornerstone has contributed $25,000 to help the Mortgage Bankers Association (MBA) Opens Doors Foundation provide mortgage and rental payment grants to families with critically ill or injured children. The grants offer financial assistance to parents and guardians so they can take unpaid leave from work to spend time with their children.
"Universally, home is where we find our greatest comfort. We cherish home , and all that it means to us," says Julie Piepho , CMB and President of National Operations for Cornerstone Home Lending, Inc. "It's an honor to help deserving families take care of their financial housing obligations so they can take care of their children."
Throughout its 27-year history, Cornerstone has focused on expanding homeownership while operating with a greater purpose in mind. "We look at our role as a mortgage provider as an opportunity to serve our communities," says Marc Laird , Chairman and CEO of Cornerstone Home Lending. "Whether it's offering honest mortgage guidance and upholding responsible lending practices or supporting organizations such as the MBA Opens Doors Foundation, all of us at Cornerstone are simply energized by helping others."
Cornerstone Division President Gene Humphries echoes this sentiment. He shares that Cornerstone's company culture and ongoing commitment to its core convictions are key to its continued growth. "Cornerstone exists and thrives because we love what we do, we have passion for what we do, and we have passion for the people that we serve."
Please visit www.mba.org/who-we-are/the-mba-foundation to learn more about MBA Opens Doors.
ABOUT CORNERSTONE HOME LENDING, INC.
Established in 1988, Cornerstone Home Lending, Inc. (NMLS 2258) is a refreshingly unique national home lender with thousands of highly-satisfied clients who return year after year, loan after loan. We operate with integrity, we treat our clients with the utmost respect, we listen to determine the appropriate loan product that meets our clients' home financing needs, and we are committed to meeting the agreed-upon closing date. For more information, please visit HouseLoan.com.
